text: Benoît Potier, born September 3, 1957 in Mulhouse, has been Chairman and CEO of Air Liquide since 2006, a French industrial group specializing in industrial gases and employing more than 66,000 people since the acquisition of Airgas in 2016.Benoît Potier passe la main à la tête d'Air liquide He is a graduate of École Centrale Paris and INSEAD.Benoît Potier, acteur de l'air« Une vie en apesanteur » ? Ai... He is married and the father of 3 daughters.Who's Who in France, 49e éd., p. 1816 == References == Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Mulhouse
title: Benoît Potier
